original_text: From that moment, Pilate tried to let Jesus go free. But the Jewish leaders shouted back, ‘If you let him go, you are not Caesar's friend. Nobody should say that he himself is a king. That shows that he is against Caesar!’
korean_text: 이러하므로 빌라도가 예수를 놓으려고 힘썼으나 유대인들이 소리 질러 이르되 이 사람을 놓으면 가이사의 충신이 아니니이다 무릇 자기를 왕이라 하는 자는 가이사를 반역하는 것이니이다

sentences.original_text: Pilate tried to let Jesus go free
But the Jewish leaders shouted back
Nobody should say that he himself is a king
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 자신이 왕이라고 말해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: That shows that he is against Caesar
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 카이사르를 반대한다는 것을 보여줍니다
